TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed DragDropHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a helper class to assist dragging and dropping inside the Windows Workflow Designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class abstracts the encoding formats used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> that is passed from the drag source to the target.
